sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_FRAME_LIST(
FRAME_NAME, FRAME_CODE,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME, ORG, ORG_TREE) values(
#frameName#, #frameCode#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #org#, #orgTree#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_FRAME_LIST SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_FRAME_LIST.FRAME_NAME AS frameName, TB_FRAME_LIST.FRAME_CODE AS frameCode,
TB_FRAME_LIST.ID AS id, TB_FRAME_LIST.STATUS AS status, TB_FRAME_LIST.CREATED AS created, TB_FRAME_LIST.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_FRAME_LIST.UPDATED AS updated, TB_FRAME_LIST.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_FRAME_LIST where TB_FRAME_LIST.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_FRAME_LIST
FRAME_NAME=#frameName# FRAME_CODE=#frameCode#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
TB_FRAME_LIST.FRAME_NAME AS frameName, TB_FRAME_LIST.FRAME_CODE AS frameCode,
TB_FRAME_LIST.ID AS id, TB_FRAME_LIST.STATUS AS status, TB_FRAME_LIST.CREATED AS created, TB_FRAME_LIST.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_FRAME_LIST.UPDATED AS updated, TB_FRAME_LIST.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime FROM TB_FRAME_LIST WHERE TB_FRAME_LIST.STATUS = '1'
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_FRAME_LIST WHERE TB_FRAME_LIST.STATUS = '1'
